resources.string: You can unlock the app with your face, fingerprint or iris within 90 days of signing in with GOV.UK One Login.
If you do not want to use your biometrics, you can unlock the app with your phoneâ€™s pin or pattern, or with your email address and password.
Anyone who can unlock your phone with their biometrics or with your phone\'s pin or pattern might be able to access your app.
